title: Winter Green Salad With Honey-apple Cider Vinaigrette
summary: Winter Green Salad With Honey-apple Cider Vinaigrette might be just the side dish you are searching for. For $2.28 per serving, this recipe covers 12% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. One serving contains 288 calories, 6g of protein, and 20g of fat. This recipe serves 6. A mixture of house honey-apple cider vinaigrette, coarse salt and pepper, fennel bulb, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so flavorful. 1 person found this recipe to be delicious and satisfying. It will be a hit at your Winter event. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes about 2 minutes. It is a good option if you're following a caveman, gluten free, primal, and whole 30 diet. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 70%. This score is solid. Similar recipes are Winter Green Salad with Orange Honey Mustard Vinaigrette, Oyster and Caramelized Onion Pan Roast with Winter Green Salad and Green Apple Vinaigrette, and Apple, White Cheddar, and Spinach Salad with Honey-Apple Cider Vinaigrette.
